ModMetaData.name: Smaller Work Stations
ModMetaData.author: Copper Boltwire
ModMetaData.description:
For v1.2+
Changes the size of nearly any core work station and building to a 1x1. (Mods not supported because I'm lazy...)
"Time to save on space"
This mod does this using the "patch" system to change/overwrite just the sizes of work stations. That's about it.
Other changes: Interaction cell/ghost chair able to overlap other such interaction cells (See image) Pawns/Colonists no longer slowed down when passing "through" a workstation.
See the Example images to get a better understanding of this.
This does NOT alter work speeds or anything of the sort. Just size of the building/station.
Made this mod because I could not find a mod doing this. And while not strapped for space, I'm sure there is a lot of you out there who would enjoy a mod that gave you more room, by decreasing space-usage.
Hope you'll enjoy this rather simple mod.
